title: Make a champion useless in 3 words.

replies.body:
Meh "Make him blind" doesn't work, as evident in the past 3 years.

So I edited to "Delete him plez".
You mean now when you play Syndra you have to actually hit all your abilities to kill someone rather then just mashing the buttons then hitting DFG-R oh that's a real shame isn't it, cry more.

{{champion:84}} Remove the Ult
{{champion:74}} Remove all turrets
{{champion:17}} Everything being Removed
{{champion:114}} Remove Everything Now
